subject: Re: Overusing a new tool (was: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit with Selenium-RC 	how to)
msgSnippet: ... I hear you, but I ve also seen too much of the streeetch-your-limits code make it into production.  --jk [Non-text portions of this message have been
messageBody:
On Tue, Feb 24, 2009 at 6:28 AM, David Saff <david@...> wrote:

> Or, do overuse it, knowing that you're overusing it, and expecting to pull
> back once you've learned the limits. That's my usual strategy. :-)


I hear you, but I've also seen too much of the streeetch-your-limits code
make it into production. --jk
